0653e8c3e9945e10ae80de9161ce1267dba66a52.commit.message:
Added a method for checking whether a locator is fully initialized.

Because the way a file is referenced by a FileLocator can make a difference
when the file is actually accessed it makes sense to have a method which checks
this. This helps client code to decide whether fullyInitializedLocator()
needs to be called. FileHandler also needs this information to provide
functionality to initialize its FileLocator on demand.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1524819 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
0653e8c3e9945e10ae80de9161ce1267dba66a52.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

5dce7b8948fb6fbc9951d2815ab07620ab77b1c1.commit.message:
Added a method to FileLocatorUtils for obtaining a fully initialized FileLocator.

There are different ways to specify the file to be loaded depending on the
initialized fields of a FileLocator. If a file can be successfully located
based on this information, it makes sense to populate all the corresponding
member fields in a consistent way to point to this file.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523799 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
5dce7b8948fb6fbc9951d2815ab07620ab77b1c1.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

42f43a5d3663414e9394654cb66be8ec13894050.commit.message:
Reworked the storage of the file location in FileHandler.

The data is now stored in an immutable FileLocator object. Changing the
location means that a new FileLocator instance is created which replaces the
old one. This approach does not require any synchronization. Atomic references
are used, so all calls are non-blocking.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523798 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
42f43a5d3663414e9394654cb66be8ec13894050.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

16adc7368606a5f638d46ba2c2c81a75e7a27389.commit.message:
Added a method for checking whether a FileLocator points to a file.

This is certainly a useful information. It is also required by FileHandler's
load() and save() methods to verify that sufficient information is available.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523797 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
16adc7368606a5f638d46ba2c2c81a75e7a27389.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

aa94b73fbd7307fbc73208d0c1e46c129b04673d.commit.message:
Added support for a default file system.

FileLocatorUtils now defines a constant pointing to the default file system
instance. There is a method which checks whether a file system is set. If not,
the default file system is returned. This mechanism is going to replace the
static default file system field used by the FileSystem class.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523796 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
aa94b73fbd7307fbc73208d0c1e46c129b04673d.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

e878bc1df9cb2e8c82dc6e1da99185fe7ef02e9a.commit.message:
Added an implementation class for FileLocator.

FileLocatorUtils offers a new method for creating FileLocator objects using a
fluent interface.

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/commons/proper/configuration/trunk@1523795 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
e878bc1df9cb2e8c82dc6e1da99185fe7ef02e9a.commit.author.name: Oliver Heger

60e232bdc6440efaf054086df88d353fc8a66bc3.commit.message:
Added a helper method for testing equals() to ConfigurationAssert.

The already existing assertEquals() method was renamed because there was a
name clash with static imports.

It is a bit strange that this test succeeded in the past. With jUnit 4.11 an
